name: twilio-phone-burner
description: A browser-based dialer UI powered by Twilio Client

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint . && NODE_ENV=test TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=my-account-sid TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN=my-auth-token TWILIO_NUMBER=my-twilio-number TWILIO_TWIML_APP_SID=app-sid ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha spec --recursive

author: Sam Proschansky
